articles.title: Europe tops 100 million Covid cases - The Sun Daily
articles.description: PARIS: Europe has recorded over 100 million coronavirus cases, more than a third of all infections worldwide, since the start of the pandemic, an AFP ...
articles.content:
PARIS: Europe has recorded over 100 million coronavirus cases, more than a third of all infections worldwide, since the start of the pandemic, an AFP tally Saturday showed.
